_description: Model structure - formulas and relationships only

calculations.name: Ops Period
calculations.description: Operations period counter (0 until ops, then 1, 2, 3, ...)

calculations.name: Capex to Apply GST
calculations.description: CAPEX minus EPC-BESS (import) minus Land Transaction (stamp duty) - both GST-free

calculations.name: Minor Event Revenue
calculations.description: Minor augmentation event revenue (capacity * $/MW / frequency / 12, CPI-indexed)

calculations.name: Major Event Revenue
calculations.description: Major augmentation event revenue (capacity * $/MW / frequency / 12, CPI-indexed)

calculations.name: Merchant Revenue
calculations.description: FCAS + Arbitrage + Market Events (95% during Life Extension)

calculations.name: Monthly Decay Factor
calculations.description: Per-month decay multiplier based on days

calculations.name: Degradation Index
calculations.description: 1 before ops, then monthly compounding decay

calculations.name: EBITDA
calculations.description: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, amortization

calculations.name: EBT
calculations.description: Earnings before taxes (incl. agency fee, upfront fees, commitment fees, DSRF fees)

calculations.name: Prior RE
calculations.description: RE before current period (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: WC Movement
calculations.description: Negative of NWC increase (increase uses cash)

calculations.name: GST Received (Operations)
calculations.description: GST receipts during operations (from module construction/operations split)

calculations.name: MRA Contribution
calculations.description: Cash contributed to MRA (funding outflow at F1.End)

calculations.name: MRA Release
calculations.description: Cash released from MRA at end of maintenance period

calculations.name: MRA Drawdown (Maintenance)
calculations.description: Cash inflow from MRA to pay maintenance (offsets OPEX in Operating CF)

calculations.name: Total Debt Service
calculations.description: Principal + Interest + Agency Fee + DSRF Fees

calculations.name: Interest Income
calculations.description: Placeholder - interest earned on cash balances

calculations.name: DSRA Shortfall Contribution
calculations.description: Placeholder - additional funding to DSRA when balance below target

calculations.name: DSRF Fees
calculations.description: Total DSRF fees (establishment + commitment + refinancing) from DSRF module

calculations.name: Upfront Fees Paid
calculations.description: Cash outflow for upfront financing fees

calculations.name: IDC Paid
calculations.description: Cash outflow for interest during construction

calculations.name: Share Capital Repayment
calculations.description: Return of equity capital (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Dividends Paid
calculations.description: Dividend distributions to equity (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Capex + Contingency
calculations.description: Cumulative capex with contingency during construction

calculations.name: Upfront Fees
calculations.description: Establishment fee (1.35% of limit) + upfront fees ($2M) at financial close

calculations.name: Commitment Fees
calculations.description: Commitment fee on undrawn ops facility during construction (40% of 1.75% margin)

calculations.name: Agency Fees
calculations.description: Cumulative facility agent fee during construction (CPI-indexed, for S&U)

calculations.name: MRA Funding
calculations.description: MRA funded at end of construction (from MRA module)

calculations.name: GST Paid
calculations.description: Cumulative of R24 (GST Paid on Capex)

calculations.name: DSRF Facility Limit
calculations.description: DSRF facility limit (notional, from DSRF module)

calculations.name: Total Uses
calculations.description: Capex + IDC + Financing Fees + Agency Fees + MRA + GST Paid

calculations.name: GST Received
calculations.description: GST received during construction (1-month delay, from module split)

calculations.name: Committed Equity
calculations.description: Equity is the residual: Total Uses - GST Received - Senior Debt

calculations.name: Total Sources
calculations.description: GST Received + Senior Debt + Committed Equity

calculations.name: Sources = Uses Check
calculations.description: Should be 0. Positive = excess sources, Negative = shortfall

calculations.name: Financing CF
calculations.description: Sum of all financing flows (including distributions)

calculations.name: SC - Cash Available
calculations.description: Cash available for SC repayment (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: SC - Cumulative Returned
calculations.description: Running total capital returned (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Contingent Equity
calculations.description: Additional equity calls beyond initial (if any)

calculations.name: Dividends
calculations.description: Dividend distributions to equity (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Share Capital Repayment
calculations.description: Return of equity capital (from Distributions module)

calculations.name: Terminal Value
calculations.description: Fixed terminal value ($17.5M) indexed by CPI at TV period

calculations.name: Net Cash Flow to Equity
calculations.description: Total equity cash flows for IRR calculation

calculations.name: Merchant CFADS
calculations.description: EBITDA allocated to merchant revenue (FCAS + Arb)

calculations.name: Total CFADS
calculations.description: Combined contracted + merchant CFADS for ADSCR calculation

calculations.name: Debt Service
calculations.description: Interest + Principal from iterative debt sizing module

calculations.name: Total Capital Additions
calculations.description: Per-period capex + IDC (combined additions for D&A depreciable base)

calculations.name: Tolling Quarterly Accrual
calculations.description: Rolling quarterly sum of tolling revenue (resets after each QE)

calculations.name: Tolling Receivable
calculations.description: Tolling AR - accrues monthly, collected at quarter end

calculations.name: Payables
calculations.description: OPEX * Payable Days / Days Per Month

calculations.name: WC Movement
calculations.description: Change in NWC = Closing NWC - Prior NWC

calculations.name: Construction WIP
calculations.description: Capex + capitalised IDC during construction (zero after COD â€” asset transfers to PP&E via D&A module)

calculations.name: PP&E (Net Book Value)
calculations.description: D&A closing balance (net of accumulated depreciation, post-COD)

calculations.name: GST Receivable
calculations.description: GST receivable closing balance from GST module

calculations.name: Total Assets
calculations.description: Cash + WIP + PP&E + Receivables + GST + MRA

calculations.name: Construction Debt
calculations.description: Cumulative senior debt drawn during construction (M4.2), zero after COD

calculations.name: Operations Debt
calculations.description: Operations debt closing balance (M1.6), active from COD

calculations.name: Share Capital
calculations.description: Construction: cumulative equity drawn (M4.7). Operations: SC closing from distributions module (M7.12)

calculations.name: Balance Check
calculations.description: Should be zero if B/S balances (Total Assets - Total L&E)

modules.name: Operation Debt
modules.description: Binary search to find optimal debt with DSCR-sculpted repayments

modules.name: Depreciation & Amortization
modules.description: CUMSUM-based ledger pattern - no circular dependencies

modules.name: GST Paid/Received
modules.description: GST ledger with configurable receipt delay using CUMSUM pattern

modules.name: Construction Funding
modules.description: Construction funding waterfall with IDC equity-funded

modules.name: Tax & Tax Losses
modules.description: Tax calculation with loss carry-forward using CUMSUM pattern

modules.name: MRA (Maintenance Reserve)
modules.description: MRA funded at construction end, draws for maintenance, releases at maintenance end

modules.name: Distributions
modules.description: Shareholder distributions waterfall with RE test, lock-up covenants, and share capital repayment

modules.name: DSRF (Debt Service Reserve Facility)
modules.description: Standby facility guaranteeing debt service with refinancing schedule

moduleTemplates.name: Construction Funding
moduleTemplates.description: Construction funding waterfall with IDC equity-funded

moduleTemplates.name: Reserve Account
moduleTemplates.description: Reserve account (MRA/DSRA) with funding and drawdown using CUMSUM pattern

moduleTemplates.name: GST Paid/Received
moduleTemplates.description: GST ledger with configurable receipt delay using CUMSUM pattern

moduleTemplates.name: Tax & Tax Losses
moduleTemplates.description: Tax calculation with loss carry-forward using CUMSUM pattern

moduleTemplates.name: Depreciation & Amortization
moduleTemplates.description: CUMSUM-based ledger pattern - no circular dependencies

moduleTemplates.name: Iterative Debt Sizing (DSCR Sculpted)
moduleTemplates.description: Binary search to find optimal debt with DSCR-sculpted repayments. Supports separate contracted/merchant DSCRs.
